p: Loss of MMP in MCF-7 cells exposed to AG-ME was evaluated by using the Rh-123 fluorescent dye. In brief, MCF-7 cells were exposed to AG-ME at 250-1000 μg/ml for 24 h. Then, cells were incubated with Rh-123 dye (10 μg/ml). Afterwards, fluorescence intensity was observed as previously described [ 35], using a fluorescence microscope and measuring the plate using fluorescence microplate reader.
